name: Trend Alert Jungle Patterns
description:
Keeping up with the latest fashion trends it's very important for your favorite girls.

They love to shop and dress in style, and they have decided to try the jungle trend now. Help them achieve preffect and unique looks in no time in 2017 Trend Alert Jungle Patterns game !

Get ready for a super fun fashion adventure and choose the best clothes for Snow White, Elsa, Belle, Aurora and Merida. Each one of them needs a new dress, mathcing accessories and a pretty hairstyle to complete the look.

In 2017 Trend Alert Jungle Patterns game you can mix and match different items until you achieve the best results. All girls must try a prety dress with leaves and flower details, so make sure you choose that.

Enjoy 2017 Trend Alert Jungle Patterns game and the new and amazing dresses!
